website_summaries.verdict: For an affordable sneaker that provides comfort and style, the UA Ripple Elevated is a good deal. It has a mesh upper that not only keeps the foot fresh and comfortable but also trendy enough to complement a variety of outfits. Whether a casual or sporty outfit, it can match and create a statement. Just one note to incoming buyers, they may have to order at least a half size larger since it was reported to fit narrow and run small. In doing so, a comfortable fit can be secured.
pros: Majority of the customers have attested that the Under Armour Ripple Elevated provides immense comfort
Like other UA sneakers, it has an aesthetically beautiful design that has impressed many shoppers
Most of the purchasers have stated that the UA Ripple Elevated has a versatile design that can match casual and sporty outfits
A couple of buyers are fascinated by the colorways available for this model
This iteration of the UA Ripple is a lightweight sneaker, according to several users
Several testers have pointed out that it is among the UA sneakers with a budget-friendly price rate
The Under Armour Ripple Elevated is an excellent shoe that is recommended by most of the reviewers
cons: The UA Ripple Elevated runs small according to some reviews
Sizing at least a half up is suggested
Several wearers have muttered that the shoe fits narrow in the toe area

customer_reviews.title: AAAAAAH!
customer_reviews.text: these shoes were made in Vietnam. Chinese-made cannot hold a candle by comparison. very comfortable and good support. thank you under armor and Vietnam.
customer_reviews.author: john fryza

customer_reviews.title: waited too long to try on
customer_reviews.text: could not return b/c i waited too long to actually try on. i usually wear 11.5-12M so i assumed they would fit. i couldn't even get them on with thin socks. very upset at myself for waiting too long, but these shoes are waaayyy too small for the size indicated. if you buy, get at least 1 size over your normal size!!
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Ok product but disappointed with the size
customer_reviews.text: I usually prefer to use under armour products but this shoe seems to be really tight for me even though I order the size that fits me well. It takes several minutes for me to wear this and also if I have thick socks it is really difficult for me to put in to the shoes. After wearing for more than 3 months, I realized that because of the pressure I put on the shoes (since i need to press hard while putting in), the back side of the shoes has started to torn out. Hugely disappointed with the product. The only thing I like about it is it still looks nice from outside when I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Sriram

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: these are very light and comfortable. my chiropractor even commented on these shoes and he may be buying his own pair soon. i used these while i was on vacation averaging 20k steps per day for 6 days and it was amazing. my feet never hurt the entire time
customer_reviews.author: james lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. Like everything about it. However it runs narrow
customer_reviews.author: Devo

customer_reviews.title: Walking on clouds
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. My husband loves them and feels comfortable to him
customer_reviews.author: Glennette Miller

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. One of the shoelace loops broke off after only wearing a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Carolynn

customer_reviews.title: Runs tight
customer_reviews.text: Get wide or a size larger, would not recommend them for long walks
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: shoe
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as other Under/Armour shoes I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J Reitnauer Jr

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is too narrow
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks great but it is waaaaay to narrow for my foot!
customer_reviews.author: Devan Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Bit too narrow in the front.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is a little narrow so I'd recommend going a size up.
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Too small, I have wide feet and the size is too small.
customer_reviews.author: Billy T. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes for walking
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, probably not the most professional but it's good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: I.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Not for wider feet.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but concurring with other reviewers too narrow especially in the toe area. Support is decent and fit is ok. After using my shoe stretcher on these shoes, they are very good and comfortable. The stretchers are one of the best items I've purchased on Amazon. They have saved me from sending back at least 2 pairs of shoes. In my opinion they're a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Alekona

customer_reviews.title: This little piggie is still yelling "ow, ow, ow" and I'm home
customer_reviews.text: Runs too small crowding my toes together. And they are NOT happy about it one bit. The arch support is also weird and doesn't quite hit the right spot if you ask me. Yes, I have sensitive feet and these were not the right choice at all. Ow. I'm done.
customer_reviews.author: Technology Guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Like the way this shoe fits. Very comfortable. Really cool style as well. Very well made. Very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: The upper part of the shoe is a comfortable mesh with leather trim
customer_reviews.text: The mesh is popular right now and is comfortable. There is leather trim as well. The material has kind of a ripple look to it.
customer_reviews.author: Bold Consumer

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Ripple Elevated Running Shoes
feature_bullets: Dimensional mesh upper is lightweight and breathable for all-day comfort
Premium leather detailing for an elevated look and feel
Outsole features distinct knobbed texture for to and from versatility
